question_text:
Question 44 
[Transportation Engineering : Traffic Engineering]
 
 
The free mean speed is 60 km/hr on a given road.  The average space headway at jam density on this road 
is 8 m.  For a linear speed-density relationship, the maximum flow (in veh/hr/lane) expected on the road 
is  
 
(A) 1875 
(B) 938 
 
(C) 2075 
(D) 1038 
Ans. (A)

PAGE
35
